history.proof: intros step init n a H. qsimpl time: 2.

ctx: intros step init n a H.
intros step init n a H.

original: intros step init n a H. unfold Included. unfold LindenbaumConstruction in H. unfold Included in H. destruct H as [m H']. exists (n + m). induction n. - simpl. apply H'. - simpl. apply step. apply IHn.
